statements: UPDATE SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity SET productivity_index = 1.25 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity SET year = 2022, crop_type = 'Wheat' WHERE id = 3
UPDATE SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity SET productivity_index = 8.5, planting_season = 'Spring' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SeasonalAgriculturalProductivity SET harvest_season = 'Fall', productivity_index = 9.2 WHERE year = 2022;
UPDATE Crop_Data SET yield_amount = 500 WHERE crop_name = 'Corn';
UPDATE Weather_Data SET temperature = 30.5, precipitation = 12.1 WHERE location = 'New York' AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE Crop_Data SET planting_date='2022-03-15' WHERE crop_id=1;
UPDATE Weather_Data SET temperature=25.4, precipitation=5.1 WHERE location='California';
UPDATE Seasonal_Trends SET productivity = 0.85 WHERE year = 2022 AND region = 'North' AND season = 'Fall';
UPDATE Crop_Yield SET yield = 1200.75, year = 2023 WHERE region = 'South' AND crop = 'Corn';
UPDATE Seasonal_Trends SET productivity = productivity * 1.1 WHERE region = 'North' AND year = 2022;
UPDATE Crop_Yield SET yield = yield + 50 WHERE crop = 'Corn' AND region = 'South';
UPDATE farmers SET farming_experience_years = 10 WHERE farmer_id = 1;
UPDATE crops SET average_yield = 500 WHERE crop_id = 5;
UPDATE farmers SET name='John Doe', farming_experience_years=10 WHERE farmer_id=1;
UPDATE crops SET season='Summer', average_yield=500 WHERE crop_id=2;
UPDATE SeasonalTrends SET productivity = 6.7 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE CropData SET profit = 4500, yield = 340.5 WHERE crop_name = 'Corn';
UPDATE SeasonalTrends SET productivity = 8.9 WHERE year = 2022 AND month = 'June';
UPDATE CropData SET profit = 15000, planting_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE crop_name = 'Rice';
